scripts.build: rm -r build && mkdir -p build && cp -R app/static/* build && npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p build/js && browserify -t babelify -e app/js/app.js | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -o build/js/app.js
scripts.build-css: node-sass app/styles/app.scss build/styles/_app.css && autoprefixer build/styles/_app.css && csso build/styles/_app.css > build/styles/app.css && rm build/styles/_app.css
